summary: Split transmute into transmute iron to silver and transmute silver to gold so you can mass produce silver ore without dropping them first.
descriptionHtml:
Split the \'Transmute Mineral\' spell into:
- transmute iron ore to silver ore spell
- transmute silver ore to gold ore spell

You can now mass produce silver ores without dropping them first.
Spell costs is the same as in vanilla game

The spell tomes were added to Halted Stream Camp.
author: Mystra007
